==Generated config==
{{{
# Tint2 config file
# Generated by tintwizard (http://code.google.com/p/tintwizard/)

# For information on manually configuring tint2 see http://code.google.com/p/tint2/wiki/Configure

# To use this as default tint2 config: save as $HOME/.config/tint2/tint2rc

# Background definitions
# ID 1
border_width = 1
rounded = 10
background_color = #000000 0
border_color = #FFFFFF 100

# ID 2
border_width = 0
rounded = 10
background_color = #98B9B1 100
border_color = #FFFFFF 0

# ID 3
border_width = 1
rounded = 10
background_color = #C27461 100
border_color = #FFFFFF 0

# Panel
panel_monitor = all
panel_position = bottom center
panel_size = 50% 48
panel_margin = 2 2
panel_padding = 2 2
panel_background_id = 1

# Taskbar
taskbar_mode = multi_desktop
taskbar_padding = 2 2 8
taskbar_background_id = 3

# Tasks
task_icon = 0
task_text = 1
task_centered = 1
task_width = 128
task_padding = 8 8
task_background_id = 2
task_active_background_id = 3

# Fonts
task_font = nu 8
task_font_color = #FFFFFF 100
task_active_font_color = #D1A375 100
font_shadow = 0

# Systray - DISABLED
#systray_padding = 0 0 0
systray_background_id = 0

# Clock
time1_format = %H:%M%P
time1_font = nu 8
clock_font_color = #FFFFFF 100
clock_padding = 8 8
clock_background_id = 2

# Mouse
mouse_middle = close
mouse_right = none
mouse_scroll_up = shade
mouse_scroll_down = none

# Battery
battery = 0
battery_low_status = 20
battery_low_cmd = notify-send "battery low"
bat1_font = Sans 12
bat2_font = Sans 12
battery_font_color = #000000 100
battery_padding = 0 0
battery_background_id = 0

# End of config
}}}

# Tint2 config file
# Generated by tintwizard (http://code.google.com/p/tintwizard/)

# For information on manually configuring tint2 see http://code.google.com/p/tint2/wiki/Configure

# To use this as default tint2 config: save as $HOME/.config/tint2/tint2rc

# Background definitions
# ID 1
rounded = 0
border_width = 0
background_color = #151515 100
border_color = #000000 100

# ID 2
rounded = 0
border_width = 0
background_color = #353535 100
border_color = #FFFFFF 100

# ID 3
rounded = 0
border_width = 1
background_color = #0076B5 100
border_color = #FFFFFF 100

# ID 4
rounded = 0
border_width = 0
background_color = #0076B5 100
border_color = #FFFFFF 0

# Panel
panel_monitor = all
panel_position = bottom center
panel_size = 70% 40
panel_margin = 2 2
panel_padding = 5 5
panel_background_id = 1

# Taskbar
taskbar_mode = single_desktop
taskbar_padding = 0 0 0
taskbar_background_id = 0

# Tasks
task_icon = 0
task_text = 1
task_centered = 1
task_width = 200
task_padding = 8 2
task_background_id = 2
task_active_background_id = 3

# Fonts
task_font = Bitstream Vera Sans 8
task_font_color = #FFFFFF 58
task_active_font_color = #FFFFFF 100
font_shadow = 0

# Systray
systray_padding = 5 0 5
systray_background_id = 0

# Clock
time1_format = %H:%M%P
time1_font = Bitstream Vera Sans 7
time2_format = %A %d %B
time2_font = Bitstream Vera Sans 7
clock_font_color = #FFFFFF 100
clock_padding = 2 0
clock_background_id = 4

# Mouse
mouse_middle = close
mouse_right = none
mouse_scroll_up = none
mouse_scroll_down = none

# Battery
battery = 0
battery_low_status = 20
battery_low_cmd = notify-send "battery low"
bat1_font = Sans 12
bat2_font = Sans 12
battery_font_color = #000000 100
battery_padding = 0 0
battery_background_id = 0

# End of config
}}}
